## strings.StringSuffix.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `StringSuffix` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(prefix: AnyStringMatcher, suffix: string);
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                | Description                                                                                                  |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| prefix    | [AnyStringMatcher](./test-equivalence-matchers.anystringmatcher.md) | A string or matcher to match against the prefix. If you don't mind what the prefix is, pass null / undefined |
| suffix    | string                                                              | The suffix for the matched string. Must be a string and not a matcher                                        |
